    PayTablepayment::publish

    publish( [mixed $pks = null], [integer $state = 1], [integer $userId = 0] );

    Parameters

    $pks

    An optional array of primary key values to update. If not set the instance property value is used.

    $state

    The publishing state. eg. [0 = unpublished, 1 = published]

    $userId

    The user id of the user performing the operation.

    Returns

    True on success.

    Remarks

    Method to set the publishing state for a row or list of rows in the database table. The method respects checked out rows by other users and will attempt to checkin rows that it can after adjustments are made.

    since

    1.0.4

    access

    public
